code: import axios from'axios';import{url}from'../url';export var login=function login(user){return function(dispatch){return axios.post(url+'/checklogin',user).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'LOG_IN',payload:res.data});console.log(res.data);});};};export var logout=function logout(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get(url+'/logout').then(function(res){dispatch({type:'LOG_OUT'});});};};
